channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Link Library
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Link Library

item.title: CVE-2022-4199|2024-08-03T01:34:49.944Z -- unknown -- link%20library
item.description: The Link Library WordPress plugin before 7.4.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
